title: Taj Coromandel
sub_title: Lovely room with a resort feel in city
description_short: Offering a fusion of rich South Indian design cues and European elegance, Taj Coromandel features a large landscaped pool, fitness facilities and a business centre. Situated in Chennai’s city centre, air-conditioned rooms offer a flat-screen TV and a spacious marble bathroom.
the_space: Offering 5 dining options, highlights include Southern Spice, Prego’s fine Italian dining, Chinese specialities at Golden Dragon and all-day international dining at Anise. Refreshing beverages can be enjoyed at Live it up at Chipstead. 24-hour room service is available.
guest_access: A tea/coffee maker, ironing facilities and seating area are a standard in all rooms. Private bathrooms feature bathrobes, a bathtub and separate shower cubicle.
guest_access_points: Staff can provide concierge and childcare services. Added conveniences include a beauty salon, gift shop and a tour desk. Guests can pamper themselves at the Jiva Grande Spa.

reviews.name: Anish
reviews.review: Excellent bathroom, especially the tub. Comfortable beds and pillows. However, I would have preferred my bed to be slightly larger in width. Also, the breakfast is pretty good, especially tea.

reviews.name: Uma
reviews.review:
Love the restaurants.
My favourite is Southern spice.
This trip I didn’t have the time to go there for a meal.

reviews.name: Prakash
reviews.review: Good Ambiance. Exceptional Staff with a Smile.

reviews.name: Gebin Maxey
reviews.review: Quality and service you would expect from Taj. Was only here for a short overnight stay. Good gym and pool! Bathroom had a rain shower which is nice.

reviews.name: Sridhar
reviews.review: Lovely location. Lovely staff who take care of guests as their family. And the food is ethereal

reviews.name: Rachel
reviews.review: Beautiful hotel with superb staff - they are there every time you need them for anything. On site restaurants were a bit pricey but everything else was flawless.

sitter_description: Petancia Pet Care is a place where you can hand over your pets in goods hands!They treat your pets as their own pets!!Without hesitation the pet owners can give your pets without worries when you are going somewhere long!!They are more caring and very responsible in what they do!!So I completely prefer Petancia Pet Care!!
sap_services: CERTIFIED & PROFESSIONAL dog groomers in chennai, Specialized in grooming all dog breeds.
We offer grooming services that include basic clean-up services such as bathing, ear-cleaning, blow-drying, brush and de-shedding.
Paw Paradise also provides more indulgent facilities like hair styling, pawdicure and much more.
map_description_short: Just 1.5 km from Spencer's Plaza Shopping Mall, Hotel Taj Coromandel is 3.7 km from Marina Beach. It provides free parking and is 17 km from Chennai International Airport.
map_description_getting_around: OLA/Uber and other cabs services available 24/7.Within a 2 Kms radius, there are multiple bus stops.If you need to park your 2 or 4 wheeler, we provide ample parking space in our basement.Bandappa Garden is a 5 minute walk from the guest house.
